alert.note: Alert for Putnam; Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 12:42AM EDT until July 14 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Fairfield County in southern Connecticut... Northern Westchester County in southeastern New York... Eastern Putnam County in southeastern New York... * Until 130 AM EDT. * At 1242 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brewster, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ridgefield around 100 AM EDT. Danbury and Bethel around 110 AM EDT. Redding around 120 AM EDT. Newtown around 125 AM EDT. Trumbull and Monroe around 130 AM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
